full_address: 13 Cressbrook Street, Eight Mile Plains, Qld 4113
description:
This stunning, brand new 2 storey luxury residence boasts a contemporary architectural design, with clean lines and a unique and open floor plan. It is nestled on an elevated 405m2 block in a prestigious and established pocket of Eight Mile Plains. The home has a grand and impressive exterior, with elegant architectural features and well-manicured landscaping.

Inside, this spectacular residence exudes luxury and refinement from every angle. The grand entrance reveals a spacious, open concept floor plan featuring 3 separate living areas, showcasing premium tiling, engineered timber flooring, soaring ceilings and high-end finishes throughout.

The beautiful gourmet kitchen lies at the heart of the home and presents with a magnificent 40mm waterfall stone island benchtop with soft-close cabinets, premium Technika cooking appliances including an impressive 900mm gas cooktop and electric oven, custom "fingerprint resistant" cabinetry, stunning glass splashback, soft-close drawers, a fabulous butler's pantry with sink and refrigerator space and finished off with stunning pendant lighting for added luxury.

Adjoining the kitchen is the open plan living and dining quarters. The living room is palatial and showcases a luxurious and striking stone-encased electric fireplace and seamlessly flows into the dining space which is spacious and perfect for hosting large dinner parties or family gatherings. The high ceilings and large windows allow for plenty of natural light, creating a bright and inviting atmosphere.

Outside the covered alfresco space is truly an oasis, and comes equipped with an outdoor kitchen, perfect for dining and relaxing with your loved ones. It overlooks a low maintenance grassed area with pockets of lush landscaping for a stunning out door aesthetic.

Back inside, the property boasts 5 spacious bedrooms. The guest bedroom, equipped with a contemporary ensuite, greets you upon entry to the home, and the remaining 4 bedrooms are located upstairs. 2 of the bedrooms feature luxurious ensuites and 2 have access to a two-way bathroom. The main bathroom services the 4 th upstairs bedroom and is a statement of pure elegance with its ceiling to floor designer tiling, stand-alone bathtub and double shower. The master retreat must be seen to be fully appreciated and features a large walk-through robe with dresser enclave, private balcony and a luxurious "open style" ensuite with a stunning stand-alone designer bathtub, dual stone vanities and concealed shower and toilet.

Homes of this amazing standard and calibre are extremely rare to find and this home is a real gem as it is strategically located within close vicinity to schools (within Warrigal Road State School catchment), Sunnybank and Garden City shopping and dining precincts, parks and access to major arterials. Words cannot do this home justice, so inspect this prized property at your earliest convenience to fully appreciate it for yourselves.

Property features and inclusions:

- Luxurious double storey residence
- Perched on a 405m2 block in a prestigious pocket
- Built by Kustom Homes in 2022
- Floor plan size approx 338m2 under roof
- 5 spacious bedrooms
- 4 luxurious bathrooms plus a powder room
- Master suite features:
- Large walk-through robe with dresser enclave
- Private balcony
- Open style luxurious ensuite
- 3 separate living areas including:
- Media room
- Expansive open plan living area
- Upstairs retreat with study nook
- Luxurious gourmet kitchen featuring:
- 40mm Stone waterfall island benchtop
- High-end Technika cooking appliances
- 900mm gas cooktop and electric oven
- Concealed dishwasher
- Custom "fingerprint resistant" soft-close cabinetry
- Spectacular Butler's pantry with storage and sink
- High 2.7m ceilings on ground level, 2.55m on upper level
- Separate internal laundry with storage
- 600mm x 1200mm Lappato finish porcelain tiles
- Engineered timber flooring
- Beautiful timber staircase with glass balustrade
- Electric fireplace
- Zoned ducted air-conditioning
- Security alarm system
- Intercom system
- Tinted windows
- Gas hot water system
- Spacious linen closet
- Covered, tiled alfresco space with built-in kitchen
- Double remote garage with epoxy flooring
- Side access
- Fully fenced
- Low maintenance yard and landscaping
- NBN
- Council rates approx $380/qtr

This property is being sold by auction or without a price, and therefore, a price guide cannot be provided. The website may have filtered the property into a price bracket for website functionality purposes.
